mapper.select: select e.emp_no ,e.emp_nm ,e.pw ,e.dept_cd ,(select d.dept_nm from department d where d.dept_cd = e.dept_cd) as dept_nm ,e.position_cd ,(select c.cmm_nm from cmm_code c where c.cmm_class = 'POSITION_CD' and c.cmm_cd = e.position_cd) as position_nm from employee e where e.emp_no = #{emp_no} and e.pw = #{pw}
